title: Why are Morgana's Wings on her...em....rear
body:
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6TDj8ks6u6I/XGrgdray1JI/AAAAAAABO3w/sDKHFSA2LSQtj506sDKX2bW2SmJIis7swCLcBGAs/s1600/1.png

How do wings like that even work?  I get that she's dark and I **LOVE** the rest of her design, but butt wings are just weird.  She has an entire exposed back so why can't her wings move up a bit.  Just a tiny bit so they look, you know, functional as we typically see wings?

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BZON3CrueIc/XGrgeXC1pWI/AAAAAAABO38/g6Of-jJyYJMeOK6xNWCtZRZ7gEEssS9aACLcBGAs/s1600/13.png

I do think it's a bit strange, but at the same time it's not like she ever flies since she was the fallen angel, and seeing as they kind of kept too that it does make sense. So maybe she lost the upper wings and only keeps those.

They also pushed her more towards the  Succubus kind of theme, and that is generally where they have their wings.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=a8mEAw3A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-02-18T17:47:50.298+0000)

> I do think it's a bit strange, but at the same time it's not like she ever flies since she was the fallen angel, and seeing as they kind of kept too that it does make sense. So maybe she lost the upper wings and only keeps those.

You're missing something. Morgana has 3 wings, not two. She has one smaller wing near her upper back, that she keeps curled around her neck like a collar. So if we base this on Kayle's full archangel look, we ALSO see Kayle has two smaller wings near her upper back, her largest wings near her mid-back, and slightly smaller wings hear her lower back, or the "butt wings." Morgana is missing her largest wings and one of her smaller wings, which would lead me to believe that is how she's a fallen angel - she can no longer fly because she's been deformed by something.

Actually it looks to me like Morgana doesn't have 3 wings, but 3 set of wings.

She has 2 small wings around her neck(forming her collar), her 2 butt wings and then there seem to be 2 wings below that.

These last 2 wings are a bit hard to see,but look at the first image in the opening post and you'll notice that her skirt seems to drag two "tails" that are covered in the same black feathers as her other wings behind her.
I believe that these "tails" are actually another set of wings as Kayle also has 2 tail-like wings in her splash art
https://i.ibb.co/L8nVjrf/23e893d1ee096a2e5734e8aebbb8700fdbd96098cb4d759c290cda9258002f79.png

In this splash art you can even see that Morgana has 2 sets of big wings,even though her neck-wings seem to be missing(maybe they can fold into a smaller collar?)

> she can no longer fly because she's been deformed by something.

Her Bio says she herself chose to bind her own wings.

I hope that they explain in lore because it doesn't seem like she's a "fallen" angel anymore -- two sisters from the aspect of justice that only the guilty have to fear.  That seems a bit weird like they're almost the same goal but different methods.  If she did lose her "upper" wings, I want that explanation otherwise it seems a weird/poor design choice.

They've always had the same goal with different methods. Their lore is based on this - Morgana chose to use dark magic to try to win the war their people were waging against their enemies, but Kayle's disgust and hatred for dark magic caused her to disown her sister and turn the fight against her, despite the fact that Morgana had good intentions.
I think there will be an attempt to justify it in-lore, given their conversation about Kayle flying vs. Morgana walking and all the talk about Morgana "binding" herself.

Maybe she "bound" herself to Runeterra and that caused her to lose her flight abilities?  Or she made a pack with some dark energy source that's normally forbidden (plz no void) and was damaged somehow by it.  I am pretty excited to see the lore that comes out on these two.

From the still picture someone posted here I thought it was hard to tell if it was on her butt or just really low on the back(looked more like on the back TBH), but after watching the video, it's quite clear it's too low to be considered on her back anymore. I feel like the lowness of the wings shouldn't be where they're coming out of the body, but where they are stretching to. In Queen of Pain's case, much like others, the lowness is coming from their posture, basically. Now this is their own game so they can make her into whatever monster they want to, but it seems weird to assume at this point that the characters could even be considered sisters at this point unless their mom was doing illegal drugs while Morgana was in the womb.
